quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Song and 70s

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Phantom of the Opera

questions.question: This traditional Scottish ballad tells the story of Sweet William who died for the love of this lady. Alas, too late she realized her love for him and died of a broken heart. From his grave grew a red, red rose. Who was the lady from whose grave grew a brier?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Annie Get Your Gun

options.text: Start on the line its discord and rhyme
Its the time of your life
Strut on a line, its discord and rhyme

questions.question: In the song The Devil Went down to Georgia, the devil bet Johnnie a fiddle of gold against your soul to see who is the best theres ever been. What did Johnny NOT play?

options.text: Devils in the House of the Rising Sun
Granny does you dog bite, no child no
Step to the left and do sa do

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mack and Mabel

questions.question: Daddy Warbucks is the leading male character in which Broadway show suitable for children?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Annie
